title: Women: Remarks at a High-Level Meeting on Women, Peace, and Security: The Next 15 Years ...
text: ( Source : US Department of State ) Thank you Deputy Prime Minister Nandi-Ndaitwah and Baroness Anelay for convening us here today. Fifteen years ago this October, Resolution 1325 made it clear that we cannot achieve lasting international
